text:
Shakepay | Montreal, Canada | Security Developer | Full-time | https://shakepay.co

Shakepay is the easiest way for Canadians to buy and sell digital currencies. We're on a mission to create open access to building wealth.

We're hiring a security developer, you can learn more about our day-to-day and what projects we're working on: https://medium.com/shakepay/shakepay-is-hiring-a-3rd-full-st...

Apply here: https://angel.co/shakepay/jobs/276911-security-developer
